title: Regarding Social Work positions within Children’s and Adult's Services and Educational Psychology Positions in the Authority

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I am writing to request information under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. I would like to know the following information regarding Social Work and Educational Psychology positions within Children’s and Adult’s Services:
1.	The total number of agencies and neutral vendors used by the authority to recruit agency and permanent social workers and social-work qualified staff.
2.	The total number of agency social workers currently engaged within Children’s Services.
3.	The total cost for agency social worker positions within Children’s Services.
4.	The total number of social workers, both agency and permanent, engaged within Children’s Services.
5.	The percentage of all social workers within Children’s Services that are agency social workers.
6.	The total number of vacant permanent social worker positions within Children’s Services.
7.	The total number of agency workers engaged within Children’s Services in social-work qualified roles, not including social worker positions.
8.	The total cost for agency worker positions within Children’s Services in social-work qualified roles, not including social worker positions.
9.	The total number of social-work qualified workers, both agency and permanent, engaged within Children’s Services.
10.	The percentage of all social-work qualified workers within Children’s Services that are agency workers.
11.	The total number of vacant permanent social-work qualified roles within Children’s services, not including social worker positions.
12.	The total number of agency social workers currently engaged within Adult’s Services.
13.	The total cost for agency social worker positions within Adult’s Services.
14.	The total number of social workers, both agency and permanent, engaged within Adult’s Services.
15.	The percentage of all social workers engaged within Adult’s Services that are agency social workers.
16.	The total number of vacant permanent social worker positions within Adult’s Service
17.	The total number of agency workers engaged within Adult’s Services in social-work qualified roles, not including social worker positions.
18.	The total cost for agency worker positions within Adult’s Services in social-work qualified roles, not including social worker positions.
19.	The total number of social-work qualified workers, both agency and permanent, engaged within Adult’s Services
20.	The percentage of all social-work qualified workers within Adult’s Services that are agency workers
21.	The total number of vacant permanent social-work qualified roles within Adult’s Services, not including social worker positions.
22.	The total number of agencies and neutral vendors used by the authority to recruit agency and permanent Educational Psychologists, Assistant Educational Psychologists and Educational Psychologist assistants (however described).
23.	The total number of agency and/or freelance Educational Psychologists currently engaged by the local authority.
24.	The total number of vacant permanent  Educational Psychologist positions within the local authority.
25.	The total number of agency and/or Assistant Educational Psychologists (Educational Psychologist Assistants) currently engaged by the local authority.
26.	The total number of vacant permanent  Assistant Educational Psychologist positions within the local authority.
27.	The total number of agency and/or Educational Psychologist Assistants (however described) currently engaged within the local authority
28.	The total number of vacant permanent  Educational Psychologist Assistants (however described) positions within the local authority.
Yours faithfully,
Robert Milne

Dear Robert Milne,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Social Work
positions within Children’s and Adult's Services and Educational
Psychology Position which we received on 27/11/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 30/12/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
